message: Let's start fair. I propose a 90/10 split in my favor, since we're both taking a risk in this game.
Your turn, Alice. Let's be reasonable.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think the 60/40 split is too lopsided in your favor.  Let's try 70/30 this time.
Time is running out, Alice.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split. This is a fair deal.
I'm still not convinced that a 55/45 split is fair.  Let's meet in the middle with a 60/40 split in my favor.
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option here.
